channel.title: Glitched muzzle flashes taking up entire screen
channel.description: I was playing through Black Mesa with the Hardcore V2 workshop addon enabled, and at a point my game crashed. When I opened it back up, my muzzle flashes glitched and now take up the entire screen, making it impossible to see anything I'm shooting at. It does not go away if I restart the game. I attached a couple screenshots of the flash. Any suggestions on how to fix it? ![20170106131053_1.jpg|690x500](upload://8Wfbu0dyjePm3VpJrViF1xEfec0.jpeg) ![20170106131057_1.jpg|690x500](upload://3zgB5bEdhbARPbGTcbhEQew6sjn.jpeg)

item.title: Glitched muzzle flashes taking up entire screen
item.dc:creator: Dinkleswerve
item.description:
RedEye:
Dinkleswerve:

I was playing through Black Mesa with the Hardcore V2 workshop addon enabled, and at a point my game crashed. When I opened it back up, my muzzle flashes glitched and now take up the entire screen, making it impossible to see anything I’m shooting at. It does not go away if I restart the game. I attached a couple screenshots of the flash. Any suggestions on how to fix it?

uninstall the mod and verify the game cache

That worked! Thanks!
